summary: Implements the command-line interface for all coverage‑related subcommands in the ansible‑test tool, handling argument parsing, environment setup, and delegating to the core coverage operations such as combine, erase, HTML generation, reporting, and XML output.
business_intent: Enable users to manage and report code‑coverage data within the ansible‑test framework through a unified CLI, supporting typical coverage workflows (combining data, clearing results, producing human‑readable reports, and generating machine‑readable formats) to improve test quality and visibility.
